crawler.service

Class Crawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • crawler.service.Crawler

  • @Path(value="crawler")
public class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
    The crawler program implements and REST API service that provides 3 functionalities: crawl the whole website find a specific item on the website show data about a specific crawling action

    Since:
    2017-12-05

                                                                int depth)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This is the method to crawl the whole website. This method finds all the items that the website contains
        Parameters:
        link - the link to the website
        depth - the depth where the search starts (usually 0)
        Returns:
        a list of Document objects

        java.io.IOException
